website_summaries.verdict: A satiny smooth polyester comforter at a desirable price. The best deal on the market.
cons: Dimensions run on the smaller side

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I looked at duvet inserts for weeks before finally deciding to try this Chezmoi Collection Down Alternative Comforter. When I received it and picked up the box, I knew I wouldn't be pleased. This blanket shouldn't even be called a duvet - it is two extremely thin pieces of fabric sewn together over cheap polyester filling. There is no heft or loft to it, and absolutely no weight. I am still just blown away by how terrible this product is, especially considering the number of positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kalleen

customer_reviews.title: Sweat and dogs are not match for this...
customer_reviews.text: I owe this a review. I've had this comforter for FIVE YEARS. I don't treat my sheets well. Sounds sketchy but follow me. I'm a hot sleeper, sheets don't matter, I probably have TB but this comforter is a good balance of cool and covered. Since I sweat and I'm not trash, I wash this bad not often and it's held the heck up. On top of my sweaty charm, I have three dogs and a cat who like to Netflix and actually chill with me on the bed and between the biscuits made and puppy power this thing has still held up. I'm begrudgingly replacing it today but I owed it a review.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous value
customer_reviews.text: This comforter received the "best bang for the buck" accolade from December 2019 Best (comforters) Reviews and it deserves the award. I would call this a mid-weight comforter. We slept with just the comforter and a sheet all winter and did not need more cover. It washed well. The duvet straps kept it in place in the duvet. i have an older double mattress that is less deep so the small size was a plus for me. The comforter was large enough that the springs did not show and a ruffle was not required. That was important to me because we are getting too old to take the mattress off the bed and wash a ruffle.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!! I bought one of these three years ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!! I bought one of these three years ago for our bed, and we loved it so much I bought them for all the beds in the house. When our daughter came to visit with her family, she loved it so much that we gave them one for their bed and for the kid's beds, too.. They wash beautifully, dry very quickly and are fluffy. We call it our "heater" in the winter because we stay toasty warm under it and can turn the heat down at night. (Sometimes I have to stick my foot out just to cool it off!!!) We are in North Florida where it can get pretty cold in the winter. Highly recommend this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful duvet for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful duvet for the price! It seems to be woven great, feels soft not scratchy. It is lightweight but so warm perfect weight! Took it right out of the package and used it. Not any foul packaging smell or clumps in the duvet. I am really happy with it! I purchased the king for my king bed, it does cover the top of the bed with minimal overhang, I did order a larger duvet cover (108 x92) to compensate for a couple of more inches of hang off the bed. Works great! Super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: home4mk

customer_reviews.title: ... used this for over two yeasr now and it's great. Of course overtime it yellowed out a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for over two yeasr now and it's great. Of course overtime it yellowed out a bit however it still performs really well. I have washed it a lot of times before and it won't be as fluffy as before but it still works as intended! Great blanket for the price and goes really well with my black and white theme in my bedroom. Highly recommend it! Please click YES if my review have been helpful to you, it will encourage me to continue writing and updating my reviews, and leave a comment if you have any questions, I will be more than happy to answer if I can be of help.
customer_reviews.author: Apex

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend. No odd chemical smell out of the package ...
customer_reviews.text: We live in wisconsin and found this duvet to be adequate through our normally -10F winters when layered with a smaller blanket or two. This duvet has a light fluffiness—you’ll miss the “full” feeling of actual down. You won’t miss the money leaving your wallet, or the feathers stabbing you however. For the price, I highly recommend. No odd chemical smell out of the package either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: My apartment is usually 65 degrees without the heater and this keeps me warm. However I can handle colder climates. I have guests who did say they would like it a little warmer but was still able to fall asleep. FYI usually wear long pants and tshirt. Also the goose down that was used is pretty evenly distributed. I had comforters where it was not. I have pretty bad allergies from time to time so this being Hypo-allergenic worked great for me.
customer_reviews.author: arrR

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm down alternative
customer_reviews.text: This is a medium weight down alternative comforter. The filling fluffs up within the baffled squares and is warm and cozy--all the advantages of goose down without the allergy concerns. I have not yet washed this product, so don't know how it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: PacificPaws

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean, Great All Year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few years ago (2017) and I still love it! I end up using it all year round, and couldn't be happier with it. It is very lighter than I expected, and cleaning it is a breeze! I just toss it in the washer with some detergent and bleach and any stain that I've managed to get through the duvet cover has come off completely. This is a great value and will last years. Mine is over 3 years old and nothing has shifted or come undone even through multiple washings. All in all, a great product!
customer_reviews.author: KatieDinz

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s lightweight but doesn’t feel cheap or like it won’t last long. I have it in a duvet cover and it fit seamlessly. I have a tendency to wake up sweaty under a normal comforter set and with this I don’t get hot under or it wake up drenched as I would under an average comforter. It’s kept me very well covered and comfortable while sleeping. Very great product for a very great price. I fully recommend to anyone considering purchasing. Unpacking was easy, no damage was present.
customer_reviews.author: KourtNic

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised... at all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these about a year ago and love them. I ordered this same one for my don’s bedroom and it is a totally DIFFERENT one. It’s. Or the same at all. VERY DISSAPOINTED to have received a much cheaper and flimsy one. It doesn’t even have the same square blocks on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy over and over and recommend to friends
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this out of pure desperation. One night my daughter got sick in our bed and I had to make an unplanned down comforter purchase - it happened to be Black Friday. I looked for hours trying to find the best deal and kept coming back to this listing. It honestly seemed too good to be true. After reading the reviews I decided to give it a try. I was pleasantly surprised. I don't think anyone can find a better product for the price. The down comforter we had previously was upwards near $600 - if I were able to purchase at the same price as this item, I would still purchase this one. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: karisa bronson

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comforter the other day because our temperatures were going tone down below Zero and didn't want to have a whole pile of blanketson the bed to feel comfortable. Well this comforter has lived up to all expectations. It is fluffy, comfy and warm. I had this comforter, and put another Lighter comforter on top ( the dogs jump on the bed so I didn't ant dog hair on it) and I was comfortable while the wind chill outside was 17 below. Some reviewers did not like the feel of it.... It feels very soft to me. I am ordering another one for my guest room...
customer_reviews.author: Janis06812

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: I am from Texas. I bought this product to help me deal with the strange weather conditions here. I used it as a duvet insert. It is not that fluffy and it usually keeps me feeling warm but not too warm. I keep a blanket on top in case I get cold at night. Very light. Good price for a good product. When I got it, it did have a strange smell. I no longer notice the smell, 3 months later.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: BEST GOOSE DOWN ALTERNATIVE EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this awesome blanket! It is so warm and comfortable! Perfect size and exactly as advertised. And I know this is going to sound weird but I recently saw how some REAL goose down comforters are made and I wanted to scream. Those poor geese are mutilated while they are completely alive. So friggin sad. So, I am more than happy to have Goose Down Alternative. Please never EVER buy real goose down items. If you don't believe me, google it. Ok, I'm off my soap box. I love this blanket. I'd recommend it to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: JessBroaddus15

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best comforter EVER. So soft. Keeps you warm but not too hot. It is the perfect comforter for any bed in any part of the country. I can't imagine not having it now. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa M.

customer_reviews.title: BEST COMFORTER EVER - 2 YEAR UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: I've had this comforter for 2 years now. After washing it many times it is still holding up extremely well. I have had no problems with it and if I ever need a new one (which it doesn't seem like it now!) I will 100% buy this again. Also, I live in New England and our winters are pretty harsh, and this comforter is really good at keeping the heat in from my heated mattress pad. LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!!! Definitely buy this if you need a comforter!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this comforter since 2017 & am now buying another, only due to stains I can’t seem to remove. My husband works with grease so this is at no fault of the comforter. I hot wash this comforter & bleach it each time. It never became disfigured or bunched up after washing. It has withstood children & animals as well as my husband & I. No rips, tears, wear or anything of that nature. I am thoroughly pleased after several years & hope the next one holds up equally!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm, not too heavy, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 60+ year old house with no central heat. Even in relatively mild coastal California it gets freaking cold in here, like wake up and it's 42 degrees in the living room cold.. This comforter has made sleeping much more comfortable this winter. I still have other blankets on the bed, but last year I had a sleeping bag over the top of my regular blankets and still got cold, and this comforter has taken the place of the sleeping bag. not only does it look much nicer, it also keeps me warmer. Wish I'd bought one 2 years ago, it would have saved me a lot of cold nights.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis A

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I agree with another customer who said that it is made of polyester and not worth the price. The picture they have up is not what you will receive and I am HIGHLY disappointed by this false advertisement. I am not one to complain all the time when I go shopping but I have had a goose down comforter before and it was like sleeping with God, this comforter can not compare to that its almost like a chunky sheet if anything and most certaintly not the real deal. Im not going to return it because I just said screw it why bother with the hassel. Its not uncomfterable its just not what is advertised
customer_reviews.author: Labamba loca

customer_reviews.title: It's thin as hell and I wouldn't recommend it to my worst enemy to sleep with
customer_reviews.text: If i could give this comforter a -5 stars I would. It's too small for my king bed. It's thin as hell and I wouldn't recommend it to my worst enemy to sleep with. I don't even write reviews but after deciding to open it use it while I'm waiting to take my Beckmann to the laundry mat because it's too fluffy to fit in my washing machine, I was pissed. I'm going to the laundry mat now just so I can take this comforter off and use it to lay outside on the grass with UGHHHHHHH
customer_reviews.author: TMP

customer_reviews.title: Best comforter I've bought for such a cheap price. Crazy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter was probably the best AND cheapest comforter I've bought in my life, which is crazy. It is soooo soft I couldn't believe how soft it was. You feel like you are sleeping in the clouds. It's also warm enough for not-so-cold winters. I live in New Mexico so our winters are not that cruel, but it gets cold during the night. This comforter keeps me so cozy and warm, and I just feel happy whenever I'm under it. You should buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Chen Qiu

customer_reviews.title: Best Comforter Ever, It's Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: BEST. COMFORTER. EVER! I have had lots of down and down alternative comforters including the Sleep Number brand of comforters and after purchasing this, I am in heaven. The Sleep Number brand doesn't hold a torch to this comforter. It is heavy enough without being too heavy and warm enough without making you sweat. As baby bear would say, 'It's Just right!" The material is exceptionally soft and inviting. Every time I crawl into bed I say how much I love the comforter. Hubby and I plan on purchasing one for all of our kids they are so amazing. The best investment you will ever make and the most affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Karie Herring

customer_reviews.title: Good Comforter for Price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, good comforter for the price. I've owned this comforter for a couple of years now, and it's done well. I don't like to add duvet's to my comforters because it feels like a hassle, so unfortunately I have to wash the comforter every two weeks. Because of the washing, it does now have knots and bumps in it from the down being moved around in the washer. I would recommend using a duvet with it if you can stand the struggle of putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: martin  a  wilcox

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT IN EVERY WAY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item a year ago. Washed several times (my daughter wanted white). Washes beautifully. Just the right weight - can go from winter to summer with AC. Super soft AND no animals were hurt in the making. YOU DO NOT NEED GOOSE DOWN FOR COMPORT THERE ARE ALTERNATIVES!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Schenone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value-I'd reccomend to family and friends
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new adjustable king bed and wanted to breathe new life into the bedroom. I want to make it a more spa-like retreat. I want my bedroom to be better than a hotel. Making a good bed is very important in doing that This duvet fits the bill. Pros 1. Soft 2. Just the right amount of warmth 3. With the right duvet cover it rivals any hotel 4. Dimentions are accurate 5. Excellent value Personal preference (Cons)/possible improvements needed 1. Button closure 2. No ties for the duvet cover Overall Excellent value, I will buy another one for my guest room and recommend to friends and family without hesitation.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fill out king duvet cover
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price, but you definitely get what you pay for. This king comforter does not fully fill out my king-sized Pottery Barn duvet, leaving blank areas on either side. Unfortunately, I'll be looking for a replacement that is larger and fluffier. Worth the try for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A.T.

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure why there are so many great reviews this comforter is too small for my queen ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why there are so many great reviews this comforter is too small for my queen size bed. I actually came back to Amazon to make sure I bought a comforter and not a pillow top pad. I washed it first thing when I got it and it already got a huge lump in it immediately. I've been using for 2+months now anyway, because I have to. But I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package and saw how thin this comforter was I was worried but I can't believe how warm it is and super soft. If you like your comforter to have weight then this one may not be fore you....it's very light feeling but like I said, very warm. Great price, would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter. I've had it for a year now and I'm coming back to get a second one for the spare bedroom. Really comfy and reminds me of the really nice hotel comforters. My dogs literally won't get up in the morning while sleeping on this haha.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I would give this comforter the 5th star if it was only a little bit fluffier. It definitely does the job at keeping you warm. I also like that it stays even and the “stuffing” doesn’t clump up like some down comforters do. I’d buy another one, you can’t go wrong for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jo D

customer_reviews.title: It's not too good to be true, amazing quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I can't believe I've never owned a comforter like this before. So light and yet so warm!! I think it might be too heavy in the summer unless the AC is blasting, but it is super high quality, especially for the price!! I would order a size larger if you're like me and like the blanket to fully cover the sides of the bed. I ordered a queen for my full size bed and still think it could be bigger (my bed is slightly elevated, also). I have absolutely no complaints, love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Eldie

customer_reviews.title: Very good product! Warm and comfortable without a duvet cover
customer_reviews.text: Very good product! Warm and comfortable without a duvet cover! My 5 star rating just went down to one! After washing this for the first time, the fill has now bunched up in the stitched pockets. Looks horrible and throwing it out. Not worth the hassle to return.
customer_reviews.author: ARTCC Controller

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy and super soft, delivered SUPER FAST
customer_reviews.text: I'm revamping my guest bedroom and wanted something that I would want to sleep in. As a highly judgmental blanket snob, I was thrilled with this for the price. Super affordable, great fluff-effect, and best of all, WASHABLE. I'm completely satisfied and would buy this again. I'm glad I chose it over pricier options.
customer_reviews.author: mp17403824

customer_reviews.title: Buy it when you get a chance
customer_reviews.text: Best product to order from Amazon. First and foremost when it came out the packaging I was suprised by the quality. Not only was it super soft, but it was a little weighted. Enough to relax you to sleep and the warmth of this comforter was astounding. Not too hot or too cold.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lorenzana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, not too big, not to small!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is the perfect weight and size! It has a cool, light feel for warmer nights and will keep you warm during the winter season. For a good night sleep, many people focus on the bed, but covers are equally important, if not more. I recommend getting a duvet cover to pair with it, as this is white as snow. This comforter also has loops in each corner so that you can tie the duvet cover into place for minimum slipping and sliding. What a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Teng Vang

customer_reviews.title: Thin and not warm.
customer_reviews.text: I'm baffled. I either got a completely different product or these reviews are planted. The duvet I got was extremely thin. Even after leaving it out for the day to fluff, it's barely what I would call summer weight-- and I live in the Deep South. I can't imagine this actually keeping anyone warm. The packaging was weirdly generic and the material feels weirdly artificial and slick. I should have known better because it was so cheap, but I was swayed by the large number of reviews.
customer_reviews.author: N.A.T.

customer_reviews.title: WORST DOWN COMFORTER EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This down comforter is definitely NOT "medium warmth", it is so hot that we had 2 fans blowing full blast our normal AC on to 68° full blast in the middle of WINTER and still couldn't sleep because it was so hot with this comforter. Both of us would wake up miserable. Plus this company does NOT have a return policy so you buy a pricey blanket that sucks and your stuck with it. If it was possible I would give this thing 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Selman

customer_reviews.title: soft, comfortable goose alternative for a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: For this price, it's a seriously great buy!!! It's not super thick or fluffy, but the material it's made from is nice and soft and boy is it warm!!! I was very very pleased with this purchase. I usually don't like "down alternative" but this is a very nice blanket for a reasonable price!!! No, it is not real goose down, but if you want real goose down go and pay $300. It keeps you just as warm as real goose down, as i've had real goose down for years. My boyfriend is allergic to goose down so we had to get the alternative, and I do not miss the real thing at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Rozembersky

customer_reviews.title: As far as the comforter save your money it is paper thin and the so called down alternative filling feels like what comes in a c
customer_reviews.text: The item was received in two days. I give that one star but I got that only on being a prime member. As far as the comforter save your money it is paper thin and the so called down alternative filling feels like what comes in a cheap pillow you would see at a swap meet or the stuffing that comes out of your dog's stuffed animal. The outside feels smooth and some what soft but it's not worth the money. I just completely waisted my money I knew I should have just bought a real one
customer_reviews.author: Lb dogface

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!! After trying several this is the right one. Great for the price. Soft, washable (doesn't bundle or all the stuffing move the one area in the wash). Good quality for the money. I have bought 3 so far. After everyday use and washing it 1x a Month it lasted for about 3 yrs before it looked worn.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and luxury at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter.After reading many reviews, I purchased this king comforter in white and also bought this duvet cover: "Beckham Hotel Collection Luxury Soft Brushed 2100 Series Microfiber Duvet Cover Set - Hypoallergenic - King/California King - White" The two items fit perfectly, tie together inside so they don't slip and they were a great price.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Flat and cheap. First off it looks nothing like the pic. My bed is a king size deep pocket and it barely covered it. Then it dont look as plush and thick. it's like comparing a one ply tissue to a wash cloth. Truly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Comforter
customer_reviews.text: Supper soft and comfy down alt comforter! The reason I gave it 4/5 stars is because I thought it was going to be thicker. It’s not super thick (which I like) but it’s pretty good quality and cozy! I don’t know how it will be in the summer but is perfect for the spring in the Midwest!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Ehr

customer_reviews.title: Unpredictable Quality
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I need to rate this twice, once for the first one I ordered and once for the second. The fabric is very soft and comfortable, but the quality is unpredictable. The first one I ordered was wonderful! It had a nice high loft and was great to sleep with, so I ordered another. The second one had only half the loft of the first, if that, and the stitching was shoddy. I couldn't believe how different they were! I'm returning this one and looking for an alternative before I try this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: jd11

customer_reviews.title: like me, but like the breathable light comfort of ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have allergies, like me, but like the breathable light comfort of a down comforter, this is definitely worth a try. I've had mine through a winter and summer now. To be fair, I tend to have a high body temperature, and run the air conditioning all summer, but when paired with a high thread count cotton duvet, this keeps me at just the right temperature, summer or winter.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan A.

customer_reviews.title: The best comforter for the price!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a extremely soft, warm, and light comforter then you've come to the right place. I just received mine today and this has met beyond my expectations! I thought that a goose down alternative would be a crappy comforter but it is actually quite nice. It is incredibly soft and really is perfect for all year around. I live in CA where it's extremely hot and then cold the next day and this will do me justice. Trust me, this is good and it came here with no delivery problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these several months ago for our guest bedroom and love it. I've bought duvet covers to go over it and it's warm, attractive, and with the cover on it, only the cover needs occasional laundering. We recently bought a second one for our master bedroom along with a duvet cover and we're so happy with our purchases. Very attractive and comfortable. Each corner has a small tab that allows the duvet cover to be tied at the four corners so the cover stays in place. It's warm but not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer  from Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Texture of the comforter is great, its warm and does a great job
customer_reviews.text: Texture of the comforter is great, its warm and does a great job. I fail to understand why the duvet covers are so expensive in US. Its really important to have a duvet cover for this comforter. Update on 2/15 --------------------- 1) I got my comforter a duvet cover and its so much better now. The warmth of the comforter stays trapped in keeping me warm. 2) A friend visited one night and he slept in this comforter and the next day he ordered one for himself as well. Price is really good for the quality and vice versa. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Heizenberg

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this comforter off of Groupon years ago and LOVED IT. During my pregnancy I spilled chocolate milk and could not get the stain out. I recently found it again and repurchased. Once again.. Chezmoi did NOT disappoint. It’s soft and light. I’m a hot sleeper and this always kept me cool. I use it all year round. So happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: The description clearly says goose down comforter
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping and expecting to receive a comforter with feathers inside. Since the description did “goose down conforter” unless I read it all wrong that’s what I was expecting. The comforter is filled with something else. Definitely not feathers. I still kept it because it works. At least for now but I don’t think it’ll be warm enough for the winter.....
customer_reviews.author: fiorella leon

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this comforter
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this comforter. I just needed one to fill a duvet, and wasn't necessarily looking for anything super fancy/expensive. My husband and I are hot natured, too, so being warm wasn't that huge of a concern. I think it looks just fine in her duvet and its been perfect as far as room temp goes. I haven't washed/dried it multiple times yet, so I'm not sure how it will do once that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong size but happy with it anyway
customer_reviews.text: I was wondering why it was a pain to stuff into my queen duvet cover and quickly realized that I was sent a king size. I ordered a queen size, and that is what was on the manufacturer's plastic packaging, but the tag on the actual duvet said king (so not Amazon's fault). I decided to try it out and it actually makes the duvet fluffy because of all of that extra material stuffed into the duvet cover. It's comfortable for me and my dogs so I will not be exchanging it for the correct size. I cannot comment on how thick and cozy the proper size would be but I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: CoveredInDogs

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal and way worth the money!!! CRAZY DEAL
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Goose down comforter selling a Daily Deal from Amazon! It was definitely a deal. this blanket incredible. It keeps you nice and warm. The actual blanket is pretty thin and light considering it's a Goose Down. Well Worth the purchase. Great for any occasions as a gift! I truly enjoy getting in my bed with this Goose Down Comforter!! Definitely get one if your a fan of Goose Down products!
customer_reviews.author: Alli’Burton

customer_reviews.title: Recommend as a year-round pick for Warm Climates
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a king size comforter. It fits true to size with enough hang not to show any mattress. I recommend this as a year-round pick for Warm climates or a Summer Comforter for cold climates. It's light, silky and comfortable BUT not very warm! I place a cotton open-weave blanket under it to get enough warmth with the air conditioner on. I bought a duvet cover but haven't used it as the comforter looks so beautiful on its own. Washed/tumble dried it with excellent results. No bunching or fraying issues like those of some other Reviewers. I have a large capacity washer & dryer though and you cannot over-stuff a large comforter in most home washers without bad results.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaBoomer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased a King and Full size and I love them. I've only had them a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a King and Full size and I love them. I've only had them a couple of months, so I haven't washed them yet. That's why I only gave 4 stars. They had no smell, and are very soft. I live in the Midwest. We are having cold weather now (finally) and I keep our thermostat at 59. Got to 20 degrees last night. We have a sheet and this comforter and it is plenty warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This is my third of these duvets! Needed a new one after upgrading to a king bed and I knew I could count on this duvet to be lightweight but warm, soft enough if not inside a cover, and easy to wash and dry. Chezmoi has not let me down yet! They also have tabs in each corner to tie a duvet cover to, preventing it from slipping around inside.
customer_reviews.author: Marika Brandenburg

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comforter after searching for something affordable to replace an old, heavy down comforter. I wanted something that was of decent quality without paying several hundred dollars for down. The first comforter that arrived had debris sewn INSIDE the comforter so I had to return it, but the process was easy and a replacement came quickly. The comforter itself is great. It is relatively thin compared to other options, though I still think it has plenty of filling, and expect it will keep me warm year-round, in a cold-winter climate. It's soft and the filling is pretty well distributed, so no lumps - at least not yet! For the price, I really think you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn C

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Lightweight, thought it wouldn't be warm, but it is. I purchased a king size (awesome deal on the price). Put on my bed, was long on bottom and short on sides...so I turned it around (hard to tell top from side on king size because it's so square) and now drapes over on sides and can tuck in tips of corners on my tall mattress. Wish it came down more on the sides like the picture but obviously not designed with a tall mattress with topper in mind. Would totally recommend, looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Mikka

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about getting this online. I went to several stores to feel for myself and decided based on price to just give this a try. It was for my teen daughter and I didn't want to spend a lot. It is soft and keeps you warm. We've washed it in our standard washing machine with a agitator and it hasn't gotten lumpy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: T and T's mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice comforter -  not super thick but it's comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I like this comforter! It's not super thick and fluffy like the ones in a nice hotel which is what I initially wanted. However, it's comfortable, warm but not too warm and thick enough for me to like it and recommend it if you're not looking to spend so much money. Like others suggested, I ordered a king size for my queen bed because I wanted it to resemble the picture and have the comforter hang over the sides. I would suggest the same.
customer_reviews.author: Maria123

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comforter for two reasons: To change out when our down comforter needed cleaning, and because I freaked out when I found out the way they get down for comforters. . . I was pleased with this alternative comforter. It is warm without being too heavy, and light enough to feel like you are sleeping in a cloud. It fluffs up nicely and looks great on the bed. I bought a king for our queen bed and it covers our deep mattress and box spring. It definitely will not totally cover a king size bed mattress and box. Great buy. I will by more of these for my guest room.
customer_reviews.author: HeatHaze

customer_reviews.title: Feels like home
customer_reviews.text: SO soft and comfortable. Doesn’t get too hot in the summer but keeps you warm in the winter. I’ve had this comforter in my childhood home for 4 years and still love it so much. Feels like home!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low loft, shoddy stitching.  Buy the next level up.
customer_reviews.text: When I received this comforter I was immediately disappointed with the amount of loft. The photo makes it look like it has at least 3" of insulation. More like 1.5" in reality. My dog had an accident on my bed so I ran the comforter through my front-load washing machine on the delicate cycle. After washing I noticed that several lines of stitching had ripped open during the wash. I either need to resew by hand, feel the cold spots as the batting creeps, or replace the comforter. My initial thought is to replace with a higher quality comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Nervous and Weird

customer_reviews.title: Very cozy
customer_reviews.text: Great comforter for the price. No, this is not a big, thick duvet but it is great for a comforter in this price range. Don't be put off buy the thinness of the comforter when you first remove it from the packaging. After it is fluffed up and it has a chance to breath, it is thicker than it first appears. Still not too heavy but just right for cool nights. If you keep your home especially cold you may want an additional light blanket for extra warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Very fluffy!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this comforter based on the great reviews. It's an "ok" comforter, very fluffy, and very comparable to real "goose down". My only issue is that I find it extremely hot! I slept in it for a week before reviewing just to make sure it wasn't me. I keep my a/c temperature at 67 in the evenings, and I've found myself waking up covered in sweat. This has never happened with any other comforter. Other than that, it has good weight, looks nice but I will not be sleeping in it too often. Just moving it to the guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Anabel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing comforter!!!! At first I was hesitant to buy bedding not in person, but I'm so glad I took a risk on this! Me and my hubby both agree we sleep so much better with this comforter. It keeps you warm but doesn't make you too hot, it's perfect for all seasons. It is super soft and fluffy. The price is great as well, it is definitely worth the money. I would recommend this to everyone. The best part is I have washed it in my washing machine so many times and it is still in great shape! This is the comforter for you!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Tretola

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Winter Comforter
customer_reviews.text: It does it job! I didn't want a heavy comforter because I live in Arizona but during the winter season, it's perfect. I have not turned on the heat in my house since it keeps me warm all through the night. Lovely product, came well packaged, fits true to my king size bed and it's been holding up throughout the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Cat2daTrina

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this as an all-weather comforter. Just as a reference, I live in the northeast so experience some pretty cold weather. It's a tad bit too warm for the summer months but I can still use it with decent A/C flow. It's so soft, the fill is just the right amount of fluffy, and the 4 corner ties are fantastic for keeping it from shifting around in my duvet cover. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: sobeachbebi

customer_reviews.title: Light, no smell, not scratchy, worth it but kept me too warm???
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and liked it immediately. I did not find it to be scratchy but soft and light with no smell. I've never slept with a comforter like this before and it kept me much too warm and I kept waking up all night. Can't figure it out so tonight I'll try sleeping the window open. Maybe I was keeping the house too warm but I had the heat off and the temp this a.m. in the house was 66 and I was still too warm. Must figure this out. Otherwise I thought the product was great...light, no smell, very warm, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: close but no cigar
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 3 stars because I expected it to be fluffier. It is a great comforter overall, warm and soft, but in was hoping it felt closer to an actual down than it does. The photo looks more plush than the product I received. I'm happy with it, and it is very comfortable, but will continue my search for a down alternative closer to down. I have owned one that you wouldn't have know it wasn't real down in the past, but it was ridiculously expensive. This blanket is a great value and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: PNW2014

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: hesitant after down but with cats and hassle of washing at laundromat, tried this and feels wonderful. Plenty warm and I am cold natured. Queen fit full well with 8-9 inches on sides. No smell -haven't washed yet. Wish there were other colors- hate the feel of a duvet cover- takes away fluffy feeling to me. At this price, could buy one every 2 yrs if needed!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very very worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My room mate has a down comforter which she paid a LOT more for and let's just say she would much rather have this one. It's very soft and surprisingly lite too. I love how it's not super fluffy and lofty, it forms to the bed and whatever is under it very nicely almost as if it were hugging me. The stitching is also very well done, seems to be high quality and overall looks really good with my chocolate brown sheets! I will definitely get more of these in different colors... I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Goose Down Alternative Comforter Provides Comfort, Durability, and Value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as an insert for a duvet cover I purchased elsewhere. The product was packaged neatly in a cardboard box and arrived undamaged. Upon initial inspection, the comforter appears well-made. It is soft and just heavy enough. I purchased it during the hottest part of the summer and have not found it to be excessively hot. Given the price, I believe this comforter provides good value for money. I highly recommend this product for its comfort, durability, and value. Given the need, I would purchase this product again without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very soft!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned with buying this with the climate being warm at the moment. I absolutely love this blanket. It's light and airy. The king size sheet isn't the proper size for the bed. I wish it was slightly bigger. It still works though. I will leave a reference photo below so you can see how the Blanket matches to the king bed.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I've developed an allergy to down, so I was really disappointed to let my down comforter go, but after reading the reviews, I tried this down alternative comforter. I put it inside my duvet and can tell you that this was a fantastic purchase. If I didn't know better, I would not even know it's not my down comforter. I love it & love the price. I think I would have bought this instead of an expensive down comforter, had I tried this one first. You will not be displeased. I do recommend putting it in a soft cotton duvet, just
customer_reviews.author: Smart

customer_reviews.title: Pretty amazing for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pretty amazing for the money. As some of the reviews say, there is a plastic scent at first but after a couple days/hours, the smell fades away. I live in California winter, so a heavy duty blanket isn't needed. I recommend a warm mattress cover or secondary blanket for somewhere that would be slightly colder for CA winters. Other than that, the material is pretty great and this comforter keeps me warm (think average hotel comforter in terms of thickness). I will update as soon as I wash this (but will be careful via reviews).
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Y

customer_reviews.title: Although it's a nice blanket it's very deceiving from the picture it's not ...
customer_reviews.text: So we receive the blanket yesterday. Although it's a nice blanket it's very deceiving from the picture it's not as full and fluffy. And definitely king size is a lot smaller than the average king size. We have a queen size bed and it barely hangs over each side. If I bought this from a store I would definitely be taking it back but it's just too much hassle to send it back to Amazon. I would recommend going to a store and buying a down alternative comforter that way you could see what you're buying
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Chinnci

customer_reviews.title: Its good for my son to layer with his other comforter
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected, seems a bit nicer than the ones sold at walmart. Its good for my son to layer with his other comforter. However it doesn't seem warm enough for any serious cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey C

customer_reviews.title: Tore in first wash
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package and felt the comforter, I was pleasantly surprised. So I did what I thought normal people do, and I washed it prior to using it. I washed it on Gentle Delicate cycle, and wen it was done, I pulled it out of the wash and it was torn in 3 spots. Cotton was literally coming out of 3 different holes in the comforter. My wash has never torn any of my other comforters, sheet,s clothes, or anything else. I feel that this is because of the poor quality. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Not enough fill, too thin
customer_reviews.text: I returned this comforter immediately upon receiving as it was much thinner than I was expecting. I needed a fuller comforter to fill out a duvet cover and this was like a thin pancake that did not come anywhere close to filling out the duvet cover. Minimal fill but I guess should be expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Toasty warm
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this duvet because some of the 1-star reviews said it was thin. I, however, love it. It's nice and plush and, once you put a duvet cover on, it's like hotel quality. It's heavy and VERY warm. My husband and I ended up taking it off the because it was a bit *too* warm, but we'll be putting it back on come December or January. I recommend this duvet! Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter, not quite "year round", but love the feel of it!
customer_reviews.text: First, I love this comforter. I am ONLY giving it 4 stars, because the seller says "year round" comforter, and I dont think that's entirely correct. Its pretty light weight, more for spring to fall use, especially in the areas of the world where it actually gets pretty cold in the winter. But, in all honesty.. my house is insulated like crap.. so, disregard if you have a well insulated house :) I would and WILL buy this comforter again. I paired it with a knit blanket which I also purchased on amazon, and love the look!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPRIMEftw

customer_reviews.title: Great mid range comforter
customer_reviews.text: We’ve ordered one for all the beds in our home and my father in law liked it so much I had to order him one. Weighted perfectly but not too hot, and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Echard Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Keeping me warm during power outage from winter storm
customer_reviews.text: We have been without power for 3 days due to a snow storm in below freezing weather. This duvet has kept me warm every night even with no heat! It is so soft and warm. We have a queen bed and ordered a king. We don’t even fight over the blanket because it is huge.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely am so happy with this purchase! I have had if for awhile now and have washed it and it is wonderful. Light weight, warm but not too warm, and durable! I would definitely recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Kept us warm in cold winters and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Kept us warm in cold winters and was very light. I accidentally gave it away when we moved abroad and when we moved back to the city we bought the duvet again (only this time we got the king size as we bought a bigger bed). Both products were off great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: You want to wrap yourself in a cloud? This one is for you!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is like wrapping yourself in a cloud! The material of the comforter is incredible soft and cozy, and the filling so light and fluffy! It’s a great medium weight, and keep us comfortably warm so far (we’ve only had during these winter months). You can’t beat the comfort, quality, and price of this comforter. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Becca M

customer_reviews.title: Better as a substitue
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend this as a covering comforter for the bed. It looks too flat for that once it is spread across the bed. But then I prefer my beds to look cushy. However, as a functional warm, snuggley comforter this one is great. If you ask me the picture for this is a bit deceiving. This is totally my napping preference. It warms my up quickly and off to la-la I land go. So for looks, its not my first choice for a sink-in-your-bed look. But I have no complaints about its functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Down
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when I got the box! I was expecting it to look just like the picture and sadly it doesn't. It's not as fluffy as it looks in the photo. I know that these are usually used to put into duvets but I was going for the fluffy all white look with colored pillows. It is a nice blanket and it does its job for the price but I was expecting more fluff. I would have rather spent a little more money to get the look I was going for but Ill just use it because it is light weight in this summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: Tbg2006

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfy but we ordered a king size ...
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and comfy but we ordered a king size because we like big comforters on our queen bed and it said it's a king... I'm not sure what king size they are used to but their king size is really a queen. So slightly disappointed with that but quality wise, it's very, very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: The Ogburns

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Comfy in Alaska
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I didn't want to spend the $300 on a real duvet blanket. When I got it in the mail, I was surprised to see how thin it was. It looked nice tho - and large - so I wasnt complaining. I put my duvet cover on it (the Pinzon Velvet Flannel... SOOO SOFT. Get it for this) and it is AWESOME! Super warm, nice and puffy... perfect for a generic bed. Definitely worth the $40. NOTE: Since Alaska is going in to summer now, I can't really say how it fares in the winter time. If I remember, I will come back and write an update come December. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Amazing especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot believe the quality of the blanket! Soft & comfy without it being too warm. I love it warm & cozy. My husband loves it cool & light... Somehow we found this blanket that we can both agree on.. imagine that!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Harrison

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two of these and received what almost appears ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and received what almost appears to be two different products. Both of the comforters have different features and one of them arrived stained. I have washed both and was not able to remove one of the stains from one of the comforters. It is a comfy light weight comforter and works well in the Okinawa heat that we live in.
customer_reviews.author: Janiva

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & Nice
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new duvet since my previous white one was going on 3 years old and changing color. Ordered this to put inside of a Clara Clark duvet cover. I saw people said that the queen size was too small for their queen bed so I ordered a king. I am not sure what they were talking about since the king size is HUGE compared to my queen bed. Not really a problem since there will be no more "blanket hogging" in the middle of the night. Light enough to keep on when its already warm and heavy enough to keep on when it is cold. Good so far!
customer_reviews.author: Steven B

customer_reviews.title: Nice comforter for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comforter to replace a 9 year old down comforter. I wanted to try a down alternative comforter as I am now extremely health conscious. It is a lightweight comforter but still a good weight and it keeps us toasty warm during this bitter cold winter we are having here in the midwest. I deducted a star because the seams on the edges had a lot of loose threads but my comforter is in a duvet cover so it's not a deal breaker for me. I highly recommend it. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Royal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. The squares are too big and the filler ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The squares are too big and the filler bunches up and the cover ends up very thin. Afraid to have it cleaned. Will need to buy another one for winter 2017/2018.
customer_reviews.author: Judy J

customer_reviews.title: Alternative Comforter king size
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Comforter! Reminds me of the comforters normally seen in nice hotels. I only wish that it was a bit larger in it's width and length. It does not fit like the picture shown as my king size comforter fits my king size mattress, but just barely. I enjoy the light and fluffy feel without the prickly sticks of actual goose feathers and so far it is holding up very nicely. I would recommend this product and as a side note if you have a queen size mattress you may want to go with the king size comforter.
customer_reviews.author: TDC23

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough for king!
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this but it's not wide enough! It barely covers the edge of king size bed so it's a battle between my husband and I who gets covered. Other than that it's got a nice weight to it, not too heavy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Silivrenwolf

product_meta.title: Chezmoi Collection All Season Down Alternative Comforter - Hypoallergenic Plush Microfiber Fill - Box Stitch Quilted - Duvet Insert with Corner Tabs (Full/Queen, White)
product_meta.description: Size:QueenThe Chezmoi Collection All Season Down Alternative Comforter is a multi-purpose comforter with superior comfort. Super soft and cozy medium weight comforter yet not short of warmth made with hypoallergenic poly-fiber. Hypoallergenic down comforters provide the warmth and softness of down that minimize the development of allergic reactions. It can make a big difference in sleep comfort and overall allergy levels. Timeless traditional baffle stitching construction with corner ties for an optional use as a duvet insert or as a stand-alone comforter. Ideal for year round use.
feature_bullets: High quality super soft luxury goose down alternative comforter for year round use

Made with the classic baffle box stitching design to keep filling in place and avoid any shifting, maintaining its beautiful fluffed appearance. Features strong piped edges for added durability and four corner tabs to anchor onto the duvet cover.
Full/Queen size comforter/duvet insert measures 88" x 88"
100-Percent Hypo-allergenic, Allergy Free Poly Fiber; 220 GSM
Care Instruction: Machine wash gentle cycle with cold water. (Sun dry or low tumble dry)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars7,620 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
